sentences.en: A mediator, however, does not justparty; but God is one.
sentences.cn: 但中保本不是为一面作的. 神却是一位.

sentences.en: All proposals were rejected by the mediator.
sentences.cn: 所有的建议都被仲裁人驳回。

sentences.en: Among many ingredients, cocoa might be an important mediator.
sentences.cn: 在许多的成分中, 可可可能是一种重要的调停剂.

sentences.en: And then this morning, all he did was to play the kind good - hearted mediator!
As a mediator, America could work to prevent what the reportcalls violence created from insecurity in Southeast Asia and the Middle East.
sentences.cn: 作为一个调停者，美国可以做一些工作，去防止该份报告认为的在东南亚和中东地区的不稳定引发的暴力行为。

sentences.en: He always takes the role of a mediator in any dispute.
sentences.cn: 他总是在争论中充当调停人的角色.

sentences.en: He will appear in the role of mediator.
Histamine was considered the primary mediator of inflammatory vascular responses.
sentences.cn: 人们考虑组织胺为血管炎症性反应的主要介质.

sentences.en: I offered to act as mediator and tried to bring about a reconciliation between the two parties.
sentences.cn: 我主动充当调解人,促使双方和解.

sentences.en: Ionic liquid can be used as reaction mediator and catalyst.
sentences.cn: 离子液体可以作为反应介质和催化剂.

sentences.en: It brings out the cruise director , mediator , and judge in you.
sentences.cn: 每当遇到这种情况, 你就成了当仁不让的调解人.

sentences.en: Job involvement has mediator effect between expatriate adjustment and job satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 工作投入在海外适应性与工作满意度之间有中介效果.

sentences.en: Method Cell immunity mediator 4 ml intramuscular injection qod for 4 months.
sentences.cn: 方法细胞免疫介质4ml肌注,隔日一次.

sentences.en: Mother acts as a mediator when John and Jim quarrel.
sentences.cn: 当约翰和吉姆争吵时,母亲充当调解人.

sentences.en: The law was put into effect through angels by a mediator.
sentences.cn: 并且是借天使经中保之手设立的.

sentences.en: The practical ECA mediator includes polling, layered , RPC and so on.
sentences.cn: 其实现方式有轮询 、 层次化、远程过程调用等.

sentences.en: Who will act as mediator in the dispute.
sentences.cn: 谁在争端中充当调解人?

trans.tran_cn: 调停者，调解人，传递者，中介物
trans.tran_en: a person or organization that tries to end a quarrel between two people, groups, countries etc by discussion
